title: Winning over wheezing

description: The Asthma Foundation reports that that twenty percent of children suffer from asthma symptoms at some stage. This program provides general information about how to handle it in the school environment and give information on how to manage asthmatics in the classroom. Introduced by Trevor Lunn.
